254210.「はろ～ん。あたしは 輝晶術士のレビィよん。\n そこにいる 魔獣調教士のガブラ:
I'm... I'm Levi, the pyromancer... I'm a pyromancer, Levi... and I've known Gabra-chan for a long time. Are you curious about what
pyromancy is? Well... I'll tell you in a nutshell... I'll tell you in a nutshell... the pyrotechnics is a special technique that
adds a pyrotechnic effect to weapons and shields with an equipment level of 100 or higher and 3 alchemical effects. And you can
even make the effect stronger... It's also possible to extract the core from equipment that already has a pyrotechnic effect... I
can also help you exchange materials related to pyrotechnics... And I'll also be able to exchange materials related to pyrotechnics...
That's about it...

254211.「いらっしゃ～い。\n 輝晶術士のレビィのチカラを ご所望かしらん？\n<bre:
You're here... Would you like the power of
Levi, the pyromancer?<break>

254212.「他に ご用は あったりするのかしらん？\n<break>: Is there anything else you need from me?<break>

254213.「もう ご用は ないみたいね。\n それじゃあ また 来てほしいわん。\n<en:
I don't think he wants to see you anymore.
Then I hope you'll come back.<end>

254215.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>に\n 付けたい:
I want you to choose the effect you want to
add to <%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>...<break>

254216.「本当に この装備品に\n <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>を 付けても\n いい:
Are you sure you want to add <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>
to this equipment?<yesno 2><break>

254217.「それじゃあ 始めるわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶核の:
And so we begin... ♪ The power of the
glittering core ♪ The power of the
pyroclastic core is here!<end>

254218.「あらん？ 素材が足りないみたいねん。\n<bw_break>:
Huh? You don't have enough materials.
<bw_break>

254220.「どの装備品の輝晶効果を 強化したいのん？\n<break>:
Which equipment's shine would you like to
enhance?
<break>

254222.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n 今 輝晶Ｌ:
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> now has
a shine level of <%dM_KISYO_LV>.

254223.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>の\n 強化は せ:
The enhancement of that
<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> has a <%dM_percent>% chance to
succeed. You still want to do it?
<yesno 2><break>

254224.「それじゃあ いくわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶核のチ:
Okay then, here we go.
Shiny, shiny crystal! Enhance with the power
of the Pyroclast!!
<end>

254225.「あらら～ 失敗しちゃうなんて。\n ごめんなさいねん……。\n<bw_brea:
Oops... looks like it failed. Sorry about
that...
<bw_break>

254226.「あらん？ 素材が足りないみたいねん。\n<bw_break>:
Huh? You don't have enough materials.
<bw_break>

254228.「どの装備品から 輝晶核を取りだすのかしら？\n 取りだしても 装備品は なくな:
Which piece of equipment do we need to get the pyroclastic core out of? You can rest assured that you won't lose any of your
equipment...

254229.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>からは\n <%n:
From <%sL_WATASU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>, I can
get <%nM_ITEM_NUM> of pyroxene nuclei... The
equipment will return to +3. Is that okay?<yesno 2><break>

254230.「それじゃあ いくわよん。\n キラリキランラ クリスタリッカ！\n 輝晶のチカ:
Okay, here we go... The power of the
glittering crystal! I'll be back!<end>

254231.「<%nM_ITEM_NUM>個の輝晶核が 取りだせたわん。\n はいっ どうぞ:
I can retrieve <%nM_ITEM_NUM> of the pyroxene
core... Yes...<bw_break>

254232.「<%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいみたいね。\n 空きを作ってから 来て:
I'm seeing a lot of <%sL_BAG_TYPE>. Please
make room before you come...<bw_break>

254235.「どうぐかばんが いっぱいみたいね。\n 空きを作ってから 来てほしいわん。\n:
I see a lot of bags... I'd like you to come
back later and make room...<bw_break>

254237.「輝晶術が どんな術か 聞きたいのね？\n カンタンに 教えてあげるわん。\n<:
What is this brilliant art, you ask? Well, I'll explain it in a way you can understand.
It's a way to add a special shine to your weapon or shield that's at least level 100, has three alchemy effects, and is +3!
You can even boost its shine, making the effect stronger.
Furthermore, I can extract Pyroclasts from equipment that already has shine.
Also, I can exchange materials related to those Pyrobeasts.
Oh yeah, if you want to know more about them, talk to Beast Trainer Gabra over there.

254257.<select_se_off>\n輝晶効果の付与\n輝晶効果の強化\n輝晶核をと:
<select_se_off>
Add Shine Effect
Boost Shine Effect
Extract Pyroclast
Exchange Materials
Explanation
<select_end><break>

254594.「あらん。これって バリバリの新品ね？\n それだと 輝晶効果は 付けられないの:
... This is brand new, right? You can't get
the pyro-crystal effect with that... Let's
just equip it first...<bw_break>

254595.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果を 付けられそうな装備品を\n なんにも 持ってないみ:
Oh, no? I don't seem to have any equipment
that can add the pyroclastic effect...<bw_break>

254596.「あらん？ その装備品は ＋３じゃないから\n 輝晶効果は 付けられないわねん。:
Huh? That piece of equipment isn't a +3, so
it can't have the pyroclastic effect...<bw_break>

254597.「あらあら ごめんなさいね。\n その装備品は レベルが１００に満たないから\n:
I'm sorry... That piece of equipment is less
than 100 levels, so I can't add the pyro-
crystal effect...<bw_break>

254598.「その装備品には とっくに\n 輝晶効果が 付いてるみたいよん。\n<bw_br:
It seems that the equipment already has the
pyroclastic effect.<bw_break>

254599.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果が付いた装備品が\n ひとつも ないみたいねん。\n<:
Oh, no? I don't see any equipment with the
pyroclastic effect...<bw_break>

254600.「その装備品に 付いてる輝晶効果は\n 限界まで いっちゃってるみたいよん。\n:
The effects of the pyro-crystal on that piece
of equipment were pushed to the limit...<bw_break>

254601.「あら～ん？\n 輝晶効果が付いた装備品が\n ひとつも ないみたいねん。\n<:
Oh, no? I don't see any equipment with the
pyroclastic effect...<bw_break>

254624.「ごめんなさいね～。\n ロックしてる装備品からは\n 輝晶核を 取りだせないの:
I'm sorry... I can't get the pyroclastic core
out of a locked piece of equipment.<end>

254626.「その装備品は ロックされてるみたいだけど\n 輝晶効果を 付けちゃっていいのか:
The equipment seems to be locked, but I
wonder if I can add the pyroclastic effect to
it?<yesno 2><break>

254627.「その装備品は ロックされてるみたいだけど\n 本当に 強化しちゃっていいのかし:
That equipment seems to be locked, but can I
really enhance it?<yesno 2><break>

256833.「うふっ 成功したみたいね。\n 私ったら がんばっちゃったわん。\n<bw_b: I think I succeeded. I'm trying so hard.<bw_break>
